divs: Sighting Detailsmy family and myself were on a mountian nere shasta dam , watching the peresus meteor shower , when we spoted a large meteor fall on a mountian across from our veweing area , it didnt explode on impact just went out , then we noticed colums of light moveing around like a huge doors opening and closing suddenly a large triangle of lights apeared between us and the mountian seven lights tottal , i turned the car headlights on high and low beam several times at the object , then it started moveing twords us to check us out when a car pulled up , the object just disapeared. we have gone back to the spot many times after that and have seen the lights on the mountian i think there is a base inside the mountian but we never saw the triangle of lights again ... ps i do have a photo of a nother object from years ago up nere susanvile thats whole different story . i cant email it to you because i dont have a scanner ...
Summary: we were watching the perseus meteor shower when a ufo aproached us.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were no other sightings in Redding on or around April 9th 1995
